TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CloudFileShare extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a share in the Microsoft Azure File service.
Docs.remarks: Shares hold directories, which are encapsulated as objects, and directories hold files. Directories can also contain sub-directories.
